overview: Mindy Rae hosts this collection of copulating cuts, bringing together scenes featuring some wonderfully well-endowed women. As you might expect from the title, the accent is on top-heavy temptresses throughout this one, with enough jiggly, bouncy, flouncy breasts to satisfy the most breast-crazed porn fan. Released in 1984, this one captures a moment in hardcore history when gals didn’t routinely get their natural assets inflated to huge proportions, so all the gals on hand here are sporting their God-given curves. And as anyone who’s seen enough 90?s porn can tell you, there’s a definite difference between natural boobs and store-bought balloons. The way they jiggle when the gals walk, the way they don’t always stand at full attention — there’s really no comparison for the discriminating big-boob fan. So if it’s jugs you’re looking for, step back in time with us and check out some amazingly full-breasted babes who never found the need to enhance their already impressive lust pillows.
title: Juggs
